mapper.select: select emp.EMP_NO , EMP_PASSWORD , EMP_NM, EMP_EMAIL , EMP_TELNO , EMP_BRTHDY , EMP_ADDR , EMP_DTL_ADDR , EMP_ZIP , TO_CHAR(EMP_ENCPN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as EMP_ENCPN , EMP_RTCPN , EMP_SIGN_IMG_PATH , DEPT_CODE , EMP_REG_DATE , FIRST_LOGIN , auth.AUTH_GRP_CODE , af.FILE_CODE , af.FILE_NO , af.FILE_NAME , af.FILE_SAVE_NAME , af.FILE_PHYSIC_PATH , af.FILE_WEB_PATH , af.FILE_SIZE , af.FILE_DOWN_CNT , af.FILE_CONT_TYPE , af.FILE_REG_DATE , af.REG_USER_ID , af.FILE_UPD_DATE , af.UPD_USER_ID from TB_EMPLOYEE emp left join tb_attach_file af ON emp.EMP_NO = af.file_code inner join tb_user_authorities auth on emp.emp_no = auth.emp_no where emp.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM') || '03' || TRIM(TO_CHAR (NVL ( (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(emp_no,-3))) FROM tb_employee WHERE emp_no LIKE TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYMM') || '%') , 0) + 1 , '000') ) FROM DUAL
mapper.update: update tb_employee set first_login = 'N', emp_password = #{empPassword} where emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.select: select count(emp_no) from tb_employee where emp_no = #{empNo} and emp_email = #{empEmail}
